title: Govt Bus
content:
What r all the college end timings? 
I have seen people mention 4:30 pm and sometimes 1 pm.
I'll have to travel quite far until the metro starts ive to travel by govt bus, so I have to check the bus timings.

Tldr : when does college end usually?

comments.body:
On Wednesday, it's from 8 am to 1 pm for everyone. 
Every class has another half day (till 1) which is different for each class. 
Aside from that you'd have three full days till 4pm
